title: [CRASH] It seems that cli.redis.io is down
body:
As described in the title, it seems that cli.redis.io, which makes `https://redis.io/commands/` slow.
![image](https://github.com/redis/redis/assets/19908547/0c646733-3cfa-4f44-ba40-aa51aa7c1bcd)
![image](https://github.com/redis/redis/assets/19908547/c014bf39-6ba8-420a-ab4c-f6cf9860c3a4)

comments_data.body: It seems that `https://redis.io/commands/` has been recovered now. Everything is OK.
